comments.body:
Shouldn't it be
```dart
if (v.uiIsolate.name == viewFilter)
```
or
```dart
if (v.uiIsolate.name.startsWith(viewFilter))
```
Due to https://github.com/flutter/engine/commit/f5371156d29b8cca3df05452f7e09f1314b1d9a1 we know the exact format.

This can potentially allow invalid matches.
`foo1bar$main-10000000` and `foo2bar$main-11000000` will both match the filter `bar$main-1`
We don't know the exact name because it depends on the uri of the app on the device, which is not available here.
